column2: Check area clear of all other trades and their materials
Are there any cracks that require remediation?
SEND TO CLIENT FOR QUALITY APPROVAL
Check area clear of all other trades and their materials
Check floor if prep is required
Check floor for U3 (3mm variance over 3m)
Check wall for smoothness where/if coving
Install vinyl plank and apply silicone/sealant if needed
SEND TO CLIENT FOR QUALITY APPROVAL
Check installation type: floating, glue down
Check subfloor - level, stable and clean
Check floor for U3 (3mm variance over 3m)
Check if underlay or glue is required
Check laying your timber floor: pattern/layout as required
Unpack your planks and mix them up to avoid adjacent identical patterns and colour variations
Check for finishes with skirting boards, finishing profiles and anything else as required
SEND TO CLIENT FOR QUALITY APPROVAL
Check area clear of all other trades and their materials
Check floor if prep is required
Install carpet including smoothedge and underlay as applicable
Smoothedge nails not protruding through carpet
All areas are carpeted: bedrooms, wardrobes, living, stairs, hall and nosings/trims as required
SEND TO CLIENT FOR QUALITY APPROVAL
Check area clear of all other trades and their materials
Check floor if prep is required
Prepare the area; sweep & vacuum the garage to start with a clean surface.
Measure the garage floor area, and position the roll/s in place on the floor
Roll up carpet to expose half the floor for gluing
Unroll the carpet back onto the glued area and press the carpet down to the ground.
Trim the carpet down to fit around the outside wall and garage door edges. Check if trims/bars are required.
Repeat steps for the other half of the carpet
Press again if any bubbles or ripples
SEND TO CLIENT FOR QUALITY APPROVAL
